name: Planet Meow
description:
A colorful, endless, spherical arcade game, where you, as a cat, try to survive as long as you can against an endless horde of angry black blobs!

The cat does the shooting, you do the walking

Controls

[WASD]/Arrow keys - Movement

[Esc] - Pause

Please comment if you liked the game or have any feedback! 

You can also download a standalone Windows and Android versions below!
